item.title: Going indie in 2022
item.description: Since the beginning of 2022 I’ve been working full time as an indie game developer. First of all, some background on myself. The past 30th of December was my last day as a developer at Ironhide Game Studio. Almost ten years working on great games like the Kingdom Rush series, learning a lot not only as a programmer but in all areas of game development. Alongside Manuel we founded Tragico Media and are currently working on our first game Tourist Trap, a dark comedy point and click adventure.
